name: Gold Resource Corporation
description: Gold Resource Corporation (GORO) is a mining company engaged in the exploration and production of precious metals, specifically gold and silver. Founded in 1998 and headquartered in Denver, Colorado, GORO operates primarily in Mexico, where it has developed a portfolio of mining properties, including the Oaxaca Mining Unit. The company focuses on sustainable mining practices and aims to minimize its environmental impact while maximizing shareholder value. GORO is known for its unique business model, which emphasizes high-grade deposits and efficient operations. The company has a proven track record of generating cash flow from its mining activities and is committed to returning value to its shareholders through dividends and share repurchases. In addition to its focus on gold and silver, GORO is also exploring opportunities to expand its mineral resource base in other regions. With a dedicated team of experienced professionals, Gold Resource Corporation continues to pursue strategic growth and responsible mining practices to strengthen its position in the precious metals market.
ceo: Bill W. D. H. R. G. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H. H.

faq.answer: Gold Resource Corporation is headquartered in Denver, Colorado, USA.

faq.answer: GORO primarily produces gold and silver.
